I worked with a team at Blue Ventures to develop a mangrove mapping tool in Google Earth Engine.

<!--more-->

**Skills and tools:** *QGIS, Google Earth Engine, RStudio*

##### Contributions
* generated hundreds of reference areas of different landcover types for classifier calibration and validation
* automated creation of catalog of reference areas

You can find our paper [here](https://www.mdpi.com/2072-4292/12/22/3758).
